name: Cursed Umbrellas
description:
Cursed Umbrellas is about a lost and found shop owner who returns the lost items of visiting patrons. Try to return as many items as you can in the time limit!

Controls
- WASD to move
- Mouse to look around
- Mouse to click and drag on objects take them with you
- Scroll wheel up/down to increase/decrease look sensitivity

Made for Global Game Jam 2021

Credits

Programming: Alexander Horvat

Modelling: Max Mordek

Shop Door Bell Sound: https://freesound.org/people/3bagbrew/sounds/57743/

Known Bugs

- If you land on the corner/edge of something (i.e. a bench), you don't touch the floor and get stuck. Just jump again to get out of it.
